articles.description: Starbucks Chairman Howard Schultz said the company will let everyone use its bathrooms, whether they bought a drink or not. It comes after the arrest of two black men at a Philadelphia location.
articles.author: James Doubek
articles.title: Starbucks Will 'Give People The Key' To Bathroom Regardless Of Purchase

articles.author: CBS/AP

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Kelly says Trump 'somewhat embarrassed' by Russia probe

articles.description: The FCC says companies Adrian Abramovich controlled were behind almost 100 million robocalls over three months. The Commission has now fined him, accusing him of scamming consumers by offering exclusive vacation deals.
articles.title: FCC fines Florida man $120 million for robocalls

articles.title: Trump to Drop Call for Medicare to Negotiate Lower Drug Prices
